## Loading Data

```{r load}
library(datasets)
data(mtcars)
```

## Exploring Data Set

```{r explore1}
str(mtcars)
```

## Simple Summaries

```{r explore2}
summary(mtcars$mpg)
table(mtcars$am)
```

## Setting Lables for Transmission Types

```{r levels_am}
mtcars$am  <- as.factor(mtcars$am)
class(mtcars$am)
levels(mtcars$am) <- c("automatic", "manual")
table(mtcars$am)
```

## Fuel Effieciency by Transmission Type

```{r mpg_by_am}
am_means <- tapply(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$am, mean)
am_means
```

## Boxplot Fuel Efficiency

```{r boxplot}
boxplot(mpg ~ am, data = mtcars, 
        main = "Fuel Efficiency by Transmission Type",
        ylab = "mpg")
```

## New Variable for L/100km

```{r lpkm}
mtcars$lpkm  <- 235.214583 / mtcars$mpg
am_means_l <- tapply(mtcars$lpkm, mtcars$am, mean)
am_means_l
```

## Boxplot Fuel Efficiency in L/100km

```{r boxplot2}
boxplot(lpkm ~ am, data = mtcars, 
        main = "Fuel Efficiency by Transmission Type",
        ylab = "L/100km")
```
